# Spell Storing
## Overview
**Aura** moderate evocation; **CL** 9th

**Slot** ring

**Price** 50,000 gp

**Weight** â€”

**Description**

As the *[[Spell Storing, Minor (Ring)|minor ring of spell storing]],* except it holds up to 5 levels of spells.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Forge Ring (Feat)|Forge Ring]], *[[Imbue With Spell Ability (Spell)|imbue with spell ability]]*

**Cost** 25,000 gp

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 483
